title: No key fragments
body:
Hey
Alot of people already asked about it but I have to make sure.If Riot can check if something is wrong with me not getting any key fragments for weeks while my teammates keep getting them regulary.I did not get many fragments so I should be getting them.Thanks

replies.body: I haven't see any cases where something would be wrong with a player receiving key fragments.  The drop rate is a curve, so you will receive a lot more from the beginning and begins to slow down until it refreshes in roughly 30 days.  This information is available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I see you've gotten around 12 fragments since the beginning of the month, so the drop rate will be pretty slow until it refreshes again.  Hope that helps clear things up!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide
> 
> Feels like I'm not getting many key fragments anymore. What gives?
> 
> The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.
> 
> We wanted to give players who didn't play as frequently a good drop rate for keys, without making it feel like farming was mandatory if you wanted keys.
